com.pilot.jword.view
Class ImgIcon

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.ImageIcon
      com.pilot.jword.view.ImgIcon
All Implemented Interfaces:
PaintableIcon, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Icon
public class ImgIcon
extends javax.swing.ImageIcon
implements PaintableIcon

An implementation of PaintableIcon realized by different types of images loaded from different sources.

See Also:
Serialized Form
